DocumentSelectedStyleSheetSet.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The selectedStyleSheetSet property indicates the name of the style sheet set that's currently in use.
DocumentSelectedStyleSheetSet.value:
The name of the style sheet set currently in use. You can also set the current style sheet set using this property.Setting the value of this property is equivalent to calling
with the value of
currentStyleSheetSet, then setting the value of
lastStyleSheetSet to that value as well.
NOTENote: This attribute's value is live; directly changing
the disabled attribute on style sheets will affect the value of this
attribute.
